title: LF Bronze Team Wanting to Climb (Not Duo)
body: Hi all I'm searching specifically for a team that needs a top or jungler (Not someone who wants to duo/play together) and wants to climb out of bronze. The champs I main and can play well are darius, rengar, kha'zix and yi.

replies.body: I can help you out of bronze if you want
can u help me keep dropping from silv to b2 and back and forth it goes
No1 Can help you!!!! Except me xx

I dont want to duo with you since it has risk unless you have learned what to do in any LoL game.
Some tips for you:
- Improve your cs
Focus on csing and not killing
Dont chase low-hp enemies
- Master one specific carry/bruiser champ
You seem like decent at playing Garen and Jhin. Master these 2 champs and win more.
